TraitDef.label: Altmer Magic Mastery
TraitDef.description: This High Elf possesses exceptional magical talent, with natural aptitude for multiple schools of magic. Altmer are considered the most magically gifted race.

li.label: Natural Mage
li.description: Born with innate magical talent, this Altmer shows natural aptitude for destruction and illusion magic.

li.label: Archmage Potential
li.description: This Altmer possesses extraordinary magical talent, with mastery over multiple schools of magic.

TraitDef.label: Dunmer Magic Heritage
TraitDef.description: This Dark Elf possesses the traditional magical knowledge of Morrowind, specializing in destruction and mysticism. Their ancestors mastered these schools in the ancient days.

li.label: Ashlander Sorcery
li.description: Trained in the traditional magic of the Dunmer, specializing in destructive and mystical arts.

TraitDef.label: Breton Magic Blood
TraitDef.description: This Breton possesses the mixed elven-human heritage that grants natural magic resistance and aptitude for restoration magic.

li.label: Dragonborn Blood
li.description: Born with mixed magical heritage, this Breton has natural resistance to hostile magic and talent for restoration.

TraitDef.label: Imperial Magic Education
TraitDef.description: This Imperial received formal magical education in the Empire's institutions, with balanced training in restoration and illusion magic.

li.label: Imperial Academy
li.description: Educated in the Imperial magical traditions, specializing in healing and diplomatic magic.

TraitDef.label: Bosmer Nature Magic
TraitDef.description: This Wood Elf possesses the natural magic of Valenwood, using mysticism and alteration to commune with nature and the forest spirits.

li.label: Forest Walker
li.description: Trained in the ancient nature magic of the Bosmer, using mystical arts to understand and alter the natural world.

TraitDef.label: Argonian Hist Magic
TraitDef.description: This Argonian draws magical power from their connection to the Hist, specializing in restoration magic and mystical arts.

li.label: Hist-Blessed
li.description: Connected to the Hist trees, this Argonian can channel restorative and mystical energies.

TraitDef.label: Khajiit Moon Magic
TraitDef.description: This Khajiit possesses the moon-blessed magic of Elsweyr, specializing in illusion magic and stealth enchantments.

li.label: Moon-Touched
li.description: Blessed by the moons of Elsweyr, this Khajiit excels in illusion magic and stealth.

TraitDef.label: Dwemer Technomancy
TraitDef.description: This Dwemer possesses the lost magical techniques that powered their great machines, combining alteration and mysticism with technology.

li.label: Tonal Architect
li.description: Master of the lost Dwemer arts of technomancy, using alteration and mysticism to power great machines.

TraitDef.label: Chimer Ancient Magic
TraitDef.description: This Chimer possesses the ancient magical knowledge from before the transformation into the Dunmer, with broad magical understanding.

li.label: First Folk
li.description: Keeper of the ancient magical traditions that predate the modern Dunmer, with knowledge of multiple schools.

TraitDef.label: Ayleid Star Magic
TraitDef.description: This Ayleid possesses the star-blessed magic of the ancient Heartland elves, masters of conjuration and mysticism who built great cities powered by starlight.

li.label: Starlight Weaver
li.description: Master of the ancient Ayleid arts of star magic, specializing in conjuration and mystical arts.
